data.title: Funeral for Ernie Kovacs
data.meta_description: Billy Wilder, left, and Jack Lemmon entering Good Shepherd Catholic Church in Beverly Hills to serve as pallbearers for Ernie Kovacs, who was killed while going home from a party given earlier by Wilder for the adopted baby of Mr. and Mrs. Milton Berle.
